channel.title: Very first Loading... screen freezes
channel.description:
The very first Loading... screen during the intro tram scene freezes the game for about 60 seconds on my machine. Wtf?
Specs:
* Black Mesa * HL2 * Steam * Windows 7 Professional x64 * MacBook Pro
